Citizen.name: Citizen
description: The Citizen is the rank-and-file Town role a traditional Mafia setup.
Abilities:
- Can choose to wear a bullet proof vest at night to make him immune to kill.
- If is last Town in 1 - 1 tie with Mafia, the Town wins!

Doctor.name: Doctor
description: The Doctor is one of the most critical roles to the Town and has the potential to nullify the attempts of killing roles.
Abilities:
- Doctor can target a player to heal, and that player will survive if attacked by only one killing role.

Sheriff.name: Sheriff
description: The Sheriff is the most critical role to the success of a town, has the ability to check the innocence of a player at night.
Abilities:
- Every night checks if player is suspicious, if its a member of Mafia or is Neutral Killing role.
Notes:
- Godfather is not suspicious.
- Beware of a Framer, who makes his target suspicious for you!

BusDriver.name: BusDriver
description: The Bus Driver can be both massively helpful or destructive for the Town depending upon the skill and luck of the player.
Abilities:
- Swap the positions of two players each night; night actions that target one of the swapped players will be redirected to the other one.
Notes:
- Acts before any other role, thus is not affected by role-blocking.
- Can target self.

Bodyguard.name: Bodyguard
description: The Bodyguard is a role designed for keeping Town roles alive by guarding a target and intercepting any players that attempt to attack that target.
Abilities:
- If a player the Bodyguard guards at night is attacked, the Bodyguard and the attacker die both instead, while the guarded player is left unharmed.
Notes:
- Bodyguard kills even night immune roles (such as Godfather and Serial Killer).

Veteran.name: Veteran
description: The Veteran is a passive killing role aligned with the Town.
Abilities:
- This role automatically kills any player who targets him if the Veteran goes on alert.
Notes:
- The Veteran is a high-risk high-reward role.
- Veteran is immune to role-blockers, and also kills them.
- Veteran on alarm doesn't kill lookout who targeted him.

Lookout.name: Lookout
description: The Lookout is a Town Investigative role with the ability to observe a player and see who visited them during a particular night.
Abilities:
- Learns who visited his target.
Notes:
- Lookout doesn't see if its target used his ability on himself (e.g. citizen, bus driver).
- Lookout is not killed by a veteran on alarm.
- Lookout is not affected by bus driver or seducer, he will notice they visited his target.
- Lookout is a counterpart of a Detective.

Detective.name: Detective
description: This role has the ability to track one person's activity at night.
Abilities:
- Learns who its target visited at night.
Notes:
- Detective knows if its target used his ability on himself (e.g. citizen, bus driver).
- Detective will learn both targets of a bust driver.
- Detective is a counterpart of a Lookout.

Vigilante.name: Vigilante
description: The Vigilante is a dirty cop aligned with the Town
Abilities:
- Kill target player at night.
- Has limited number of bullets.

Escort.name: Escort
description: When used strategically, the Escort has the ability to one of the more powerful Town roles.
Abilities:
- Role-block a target at night, preventing them from using their night ability.
Notes:
- Veteran on alarm kills any Escort targeting him.
- Serial Killer also kills role-blockers who target him.
- Consort is the same role but is sided with Mafia.
- Role-blockers can't role-block Role-blockers.

Investigator.name: Investigator
description: The Investigator is one of the Town's more powerful roles and necessary to the long-term survival of the Town.
Abilities:
- Learns a clue about targets role, which present's 2 or 3 roles. One of those is targets actual role.

Godfather.name: Godfather
description: Godfather has the final say on the Mafia's kill options at night.
Abilities: None
Notes:
- Godfather is night immune, can't be killed by killing roles.
- Godfather is not suspicious to Sheriff.

Mafioso.name: Mafioso
description: The Mafioso is essentially a henchman of the Mafia and the most basic Mafia-aligned role. Can suggest to kill people at night.
Abilities: None
Notes:
- Random Mafioso is chosen to kill Mafia's target.

Agent.name: Agent
description: He tracks one person at night, seeing who visited and who this person visited that night.
Abilities:
- Learns who visited and who this person visited that night.
Notes:
- This role is combination of Lookout and Detective.
- Can act every 2 nights.

Framer.name: Framer
description: The Framer is a particularly powerful role capable of discrediting Sheriffs.
Abilities:
- Make your target appear suspicous to Sheriff that night.

Seducer.name: Seducer
description: The Seducer has the ability to hide in a player's home, redirecting all effects targeting the Seducer to instead affect his target.
Abilities:
- Hide in targets house, other players who will target you, will target your target.
- Seducer can act limited number of times.
Notes:
- Seducer acts before all other roles except of bus driver, making him immune to role-blockers.
- Veteran doesn't kill Seducer. Try to use it.

Counselor.name: Counselor
description: The Counselor is an Investigator affiliated with the Mafia.
Abilities:
- Learns a clue about targets role, which present's 2 or 3 roles. One of those is targets actual role.
- Becomes Godfather, if there is none alive.

Consort.name: Consort
description: The Consort has the potential to be one of the most powerful roles a Mafia can utilize.
Abilities:
- Role-block a target at night, preventing them from using their night ability.
Notes:
- Veteran on alarm kills any Consort targeting him.
- Serial Killer also kills role-blockers who target him.
- Escort is the same role but is sided with Town.
- Role-blockers can't role-block Role-blockers.

MassMurder.name: MassMurder
description: Each night, you target someone and kill everyone at their house. Win staying last one alive.
Abilities:
- Kill target and all other players visiting your target.
Notes:
- Can target someone every 2 nights.
- Bodyguard my save everybody if targets your target or any visitor.
- Doctor may heal your target or visitor.
- Looses 1-1 tie with Serial Killer.

SerialKiller.name: SerialKiller
description: Kill someone each night. Win staying last one alive.
Abilities:
- Kill your target.
Notes:
- Serial Killer has a night immunity, can't be killed by killing roles.
- Serial Killer redirects his attack to the role-blocker targeting him.
- Wins 1-1 tie with Mass Murder.

Survivor.name: Survivor
description: Survivor is can wear a vest for few nights. Survive until one team wins.
Abilities:
- Gain a night immunity for a night.
- Limited number of uses.
Notes:
- Wins if the game ends and he is alive.

Jester.name: Jester
description: Make town lynch you during the day.
Abilities: None
Notes:
- Wins only if gets lynched during the day.
- Looses if game ends or he gets killed during the night.
- If Jester gets lynched, he makes one random person suicide next night. Nobody can save the victim.

Executioner.name: Executioner
description: At the beginning of the game you get a random Town target. If your target is lynched during the day, you win.
Abilities: None
Notes:
- If your target dies at night, you become a Jester.
